1.0.name: wordpress/dq-bandcamp-library
1.0.description:
Bandcamp Library is a simple plugin and a page template for your existing theme. Add both to your WordPress install and start adding Bandcamp page URLs in your admin panel. All pages added will show as an album tile on the library page. The purpose is organize a growing collection of favorites in a single, easy to use library; playing the music is handled through an embedded Bandcamp player.

To see a working example, go to http://www.disposablequalities.com/bandcamplib/
